content.detailedDescription: We saw object only in downloaded pictures. looks like a ufo to me.
content.summary: Saw object only in photo when downloaded

content.detailedDescription: Disc with "aliens" outside craft. not sure if this is the real thing, but if it's cgi they did an excellent job. thought you should check it out if you haven't already which i'm sure video has been sent to you.
content.summary: Is on facebook sent to me by friend

content.detailedDescription: An intensely bright egg shaped light in the nw above a band of clouds caught my eye as i turned off to the road home. i turned on indian hill road heading west and it was just to the north of the road in the far distance. it's size and brightness caught my attention. i assumed it was a plane from the airport but when it remained in place, very bright and very large until drove in my drive, i was considering other things (weather balloon - but seemed far too large for that). it glowed but it did not seem reflective like with other weather balloons i have seen and was a single light so did not seem like a plane and the size was troubling. i could still see it as i parked in my drive. i went into the house to get a pair of binoculars but when i came back out it was gone; did not see where.  there was a band of clouds just above the horizon.  i have never seen such a large and bright egg shaped light before.
content.summary: An intensely bright egg shaped light in the nw above a band of clouds caught my eye as i turned off to the road home, it remained in place, very bright and very large until drove in my drive. then it was gone; did not see where.

content.detailedDescription: Was taken hdr photos from on top the hotel, photos taken in raw format and when i processed the photos into hdr images this object came into view. at first i thought it was a plane, have a airport near bye, but the light reflection off the object did not change as the sun went down or as the object moved, that should not have happened.
content.summary: Photographs taken

content.detailedDescription: At about 8:30 pm eastern i went outside and sat on the porch. i looked to my left which is to the western sky. i saw a tightly grouped formation of "stars", one at 10 o'clock, the other 4 o'clock at about 25 degrees or so elevation. the sky was clear, with no restriction. they were about two to three finger widths apart at arms length, and very bright. much brighter than other stars one would see in the sky. based on my experience and knowledge this was very odd. the lower "star" after about six seconds intensified in brightness, then dimmed out, followed by the higher elevation "star" dimming out. this was something that shook my core. i had a simliar experience almost one year previously to that date. it was in the second week of october 2012. on this event i was outside on the porch at 5:45 am before going to work. again, like i usually do, i looked to the western sky. i saw the identical odd "star" pattern. this event lasted the same amount of time, about 8 seconds. both stars winked out, or dimmed, at the same rate until they dissapeared. like a dimmer switch. the sky was clear.
content.summary: Unnatural  twin "star" formation observered in the w sky. both objects at same high magnitude brighter than any other in a 10 and 4 o'clock close group formation. lower "star"  brightened and then winked out, followed by other "star"  that winked out.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a pool sitting back with sun glasses on when i noted a craft in the sky hovering between clouds.  it appeared to have some sort of structure like windows but not exactly windows and was sauser shaped.  it just hovered making no sounds between clouds moving very slowly at one point then flew off in a northern direction at a very high rate of speed also making no sound until no longer visible.  i was shocked and profoundly affected...I never looked at the world the same again.  prior to that experience i had no belief in ufo's and still cannot understand what they may be.  i am not certain what to think but i know what i saw was real and clearly a high tech flying vehicle.
content.summary: Witnessed a sauser shaped peuter colored craft in the sky almost directly above me in the middle of the day hovering between clouds then after a few minutes flying off in a very fast rate of speed with no sound at all.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home playing video games in the garage with my two daughters. we have large windows on my garage door and i glanced out while sitting on the couch. when i glanced out the window i saw a a white bright light heading toward our direction from over the hills i can view in the distance. the first thought that flashed throu my head was that it was an airplane, but as i continues to watch( 3-4 seconds later) i realized that what ever it was was moving far to fast to a commercial airline. not only this but what i would now call a ufo was pulsating different colors as well as rotating. at this point i had been watching it for about 15 seconds and was explaining what i was seeing to my daughter's. they wanted to see out the window too. so i picked them both up . in our amazment we watched as it seemed to drastically change direction from se to ne instantly and headed toward the mountains at a speed a did not think possible. once it changed directions it took roughly 3 seconds to move out of view. once out of sight a commercial airline heading toward los angeles international airport ( i know this because the flights pass over my house roughly every 10-15 minutes on the same course as the would have been on a collision course with idk and may have seen it or uncountered it on rader.
content.summary: Sighting in indland empire

content.detailedDescription:
My name is mike makki ,i am 3d architect,in 1992 i went to bed like normal time then during the night i woke up but i was still a sleep if you know what i mean,couldn't move i could hear

children like sound at the foot of the bed ,then i felt someone was pulling hard of my big toe as if they intended to hurt me,they were 3 small alien about 4 foot and one leader slightly bigger asked them not wake me from my sleep. the leader done something in my arm before the left,until last year i didn't know what the event it meant or what is was and be honest i didn't think much of then i watched a programme about people abducted by aliens,what the people described in the programme is exactly how i felt,the feeling of you are awake but cant move,i could hear sounds like recording when put fast-forward. i haven't told anyone except my wife.

the question is is this some sort of encounter??I know they have done something in my arm but i don't know what it is. i can you one thing they are not friendly and they intend to inflect pain. if someone is interested i more than happy tell the full story.

regards

mike makki

07889 494 568
content.summary: This is not ufo,it was some sort of alien encounter, i didnt see any ufo just 4 small aline bodies grey colour next to my bed.

content.detailedDescription: Saw flying craft out of the west over papago mountains. came our way then disappeared. not in typical sky harbor flight path. disappeared to the north east
content.summary: Orange flying aircraft outside the normal sky harbor current pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting in my hot tub in the backyard of my house at 11:30 pm and became aware of two bright lights which appeared to be either climbing vertically or flying toward my location from the southwest in a northeasterly direction. the red light was very bright and approximately 1/4 to 3/8 inch in diameter at arms length. the green light was equally bright but was approximately 1/4 to 1/3 the size of the red light and positioned slightly below the center and slightly left of the red light. they were separated by about one red light diameter.
as they climbed or proceeded in my direction, i initially assumed it was an airplane or helicopter but realized that was not the case since the red navigation light is not normally visible as an aircraft approaches. red anti-collision lights are but those flash or strobe. the red light was steady throughout the event.  as the lights approached i shined a fairly powerful flashlight in its direction whereupon all motion ceased and the green light began to pulsate with increasing irregularity. after approximately 10 to 20 seconds the lights began to descend and a beam of green light was visible emanating from the pulsating green light. the beam had a slight spread which indicated it was not laser like. the beam length was approximately 8-10 red light diameters in length and angled down from left to right at an approximate angle of 20 to 30  degrees from vertical. as the light descended below the level of the  roofline,  i stood on the hot tub to not lose sight. as i continued to observe the lights descend they appeared to merge into a single light, the beam disappeared,  and the color changed to a yellowish, pinkish hue. i hurried indoors and woke my wife to see this. i went to my front porch which faces approximately southwest to continue viewing the lights as my wife joined me. she also observed the lights for approximately 10-15 seconds as they descended to the horizon and out of sight. 
the lights became smaller in size by about 1/2 diameter as they merged and descended. there was no sound throughout the sequence. my wife and i discussed this and decided it may be a uav however this does not explain the lights, the beam or the changing light color or size. i am a pilot and air traffic controller with over 25 years experience and consider myself an excellent observer.
content.summary: One bright red light with one bright green light approximately 1/2 the size climbed then hoveref then descended while emitting green beam

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were driving on chaparral road in scottsdale, arizona at 7:01 pm mountain (arizona) time on monday, may 5th, 2014. we had just finished shopping and were headed home. the sky was overcast and it was twilight. (note that arizona does not observe daylights saving time). on the horizon to the slight north of camelback mountain was a large spherical object with orangish-white lights dotted around its rim. i did not see great detail of the object, but it looked gray and its lights were easy to see. it caught my eye because i thought it was weird for a plane to be flying that low. i see planes all the time coming to and from sky harbor in phoenix, but this was not in a normal pathway, nor was it anywhere near as high as planes. then i realized it was not shaped like a plane or a helicopter and it was really large. my mom was already looking at it too. i pointed at it and said, "what is that?" then we both just watched it for a few seconds and it slowly faded out. it looked as if it was either stationary or moving very slightly. it did not turn or change directions. it did not disappear suddenly. it just slowly became invisible, like something straight out of star wars. that was when we started freaking out. the whole duration of seeing the object felt like it was between 5-7 seconds. i have never seen anything like this in my life.
content.summary: Ufo spotted in scottsdale, arizona (looking west)

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were in our hot tub at about 9:10pm on mon, may 5th. (i usually star gaze while soaking). after soaking for i'd guess 30-40 min a bright star-like light caught my eye in what i'm thinking was the n.East to east section of the sky. the light became brighter quickly, then it dimmed and was gone. i kept staring, thinking i'd see a faint star or some light source, but there was nothing left in the spot to explain what it was. my daughter asked me if it could've been a star burning out. i told her it might be. not long after that my daughter pointed over to the northern sky and said "what is that? ?". as i turned my head i caught a bright light out of the corner of my eye. she stood up and said that she saw a light brighten as it moved from left to right -just over our rooftop. she said it zig-zagged before disappearing. it was the exact same brightening then dimming that i saw in the n. east. i am not not sure what it was we saw in the sky tonite, but i am not aware of any aircraft that are capable of moving that quickly in different directions, then completely disappearing. also i would like to say i did not see any red lights at any time (such as aircraft are required to have) only white lights. i feel like i saw something that i cannot explain & it intrigues me. i do not feel scared or tremendous excitement- but i feel the need to understand what i saw and i'd like to know what other witnesses have to say.
content.summary: Was in hot tub & saw bright light flash then dim to complete disappearance. 2nd light zigzagged before disappearing as 1st did

content.detailedDescription: Walking into my home. standing in the back yard. thousands of lights flew over from the se heading nw at an extremely fast rate of speed. i thought it was a plane, but the mass quickly expanded beyond that of anything we know. these things flew at an unworldy speed. there were commercial flights in the air at the same time. they stood still in comparison. the lights rolled over like a wave, silently at a very high altitude. the formation spanned over a mile. it was huge. there were thousands, all together. no trails, nothing. lasted about 15 seconds. amazing and unexplainable. i am going to look for them again, and i am going to capture footage. i felt amazed to see this. i've never seen anything like it in several decades of stargazing. convinced.
content.summary: Thousands of bright lights flying extremely fast at high altitude in a nw heading. they flew in an arc formation. the formation spanned beyond one mile in width. faster than anything known.

content.detailedDescription: On may 3rd, 2014, i was driving from pleasant view tn, to clarksville, as i entered clarksville and got on 101st airborne parkway going towards ft. campbell, i was driving towards the intersection that crossed between 101st airborne parkway and trenton rd. i noticed seeing a reddish-orange star to my left hand side and noticed that this star looked like the planet mars. i thought to myself that it looked much brighter in the sky that night, the second and third glance i made at this object it had gotten much bigger and brighter, as i came to a stop at the four way intersection. i continued observing it, which i had already assumed this object was not a star but something that was actually moving and coming towards my direction. it was moving from e to sw moving in a straight line path and slow enough to observe it while i made a stop at the red-light at the four way intersection. the object had a cigar-blimp like shape to it, the entire object has a reddish-orange color coming from it. it also had a shimmering bright yellow with orange glow pulsating from it as it got closer in my direction. it looked large maybe around 100 ft. and was in the air probably cloud level. it continued to move and as it floated over the backside of the truck, no sound was made and eventually i lost sight of it. i believe i saw something that was very strange here in clarksville. the main thing about this object was that the entire object glowed and no blinking lights were visible to indicate that it was a plane or helicopter. it did not make sound whatsoever as it floated over the vehicle i was in.
content.summary: Driving on the highway and oberved a bright object moving that resembled the planet mars.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went out back to smoke. as always i look to the sky because ive witnessed strange sightings before. as we were sitting there i began to notice a star like object begin to move from north to south. aprox. 20�� to abt 70�� then appeared to ascend and disappear. i was excited to witness another strange sighting. abt 30 minutes later i went back outside to look out of curiosity and i saw the same lighted star like object moving this time from south to north aprox. 80��-30�� and also ascended and disappeared. neither objects speed increased or became brighter. there wasnt any flashing lights. it litterally looked like a star slowly moving across the sky then just go up and disappear.
content.summary: 2  lighted objects passing over head

content.detailedDescription: As my wife and i took a break from watching t.V., we let our dogs out for the being time tonight; when i looked at our clear sky tonight and noticed the moon bright as it was noticed something in the air flashing lights. i asked my wife what that was and she said its a plane. i said no and pointed out a plane flying. this was above the tree line and it looked sort of like a chevron, but almost like a curved fixture. i have seen satellites in the sky and this object was not moving. there was lights coming from it, almost what looks like a star like kind of light. i have an app on my phone google sky map; i used the moon as a reference saw the moon, jupiter, sirius, but this was not it. i also saw the star as i was looking at it from the moon down to the left called procoyn. that did not match up to the light of the object. i have a video on my phone, if you email me back i will send it to you. i honestly do not know what i saw.
content.summary: Strange lights

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed a red orb at tree top level one evening walking with a friend. we observed the object begin to move slowly away from us then the next moment we were standing there and there were two objects that moved slowly away from us until they disappeared to the south.  as the objects moved they remained about 10-15 away from each other and moved together at same speed.
content.summary: Saw one then two red orbs hovering above field across from neighbors house late one night

content.detailedDescription: Driving late one night after work i observed 5 bright lights which i first thought to be helicopters hovering near road.  as i grew closer i noticed one was directly above rode but it was part of a group that was hovering above a house on the bluff next to the road.  as i drove under the object i looked up through the windshield and could see the bottom half of the object that was not shrouded in a glowing white light, it was shiny and looked like i was looking up at the bottom of a giant silvery egg about 20-30 feet from end to end.
content.summary: While driving late at night witnessed  5 egg-shaped objects emitting while glowing light around house and above highway - 5 objects in a circle

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into my drive way, i had never seen anything like it before and have been around aircraft all my life.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star but then i quckly noticed it was moving very fast moving from northeast toward the west it then stoped dead and hovered for about 5 min. it was kind of domed shaped on top but flat on the bottom there was no soun and the color it seemed to be glowing it was bluish green very bright in color. after the sighting sighting i almost couldnt believe what i had seen, told my family what i had seen right after the sighting i was vey excited. it went back toward the north east very fast it was out of my sight within a half of a second if i would have blinked i would have missed its leaving
content.summary: I watched a bright grenish blue object flying fron the northeast moving west i then witnessed it hovering maybe a mile and a half from me after watching it for about 5 min it left the area backnortheast if i would have blinked i would have missed it.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in the lower level of our home. my partner was up stairs in the living room lying down on the couch also watching tv. while watching tv, i was also talking to a friend of ours on the cordless telephone. suddenly, my partner called down to me with urgency to come up to identify what he was witnessing. when i went up to see, there were three amber/orange bright lights slowly gliding in the sky in the form of a triangular pattern . there was a lead light and one on each side of it. the spacing between them appeared to be even spacing and they seemed to be synchronized in speed. my partner told me that when he first saw the first image it was hovering by its self and then joined by the other two glowing images. they appeared to be the same in size and from where we were standing circular in shape like that of a football. we quickly ran outside to get a better view. there was no sound or sent coming from the images. they slowly glided through the sky heading north of our home.
content.summary: There was a bright amber lights hovering over our home and then proceeded to move in a tri-angle pattern.

content.detailedDescription: White round object flew in from clouds sunny afternoon turned abruptly disappearing into clouds. video tape available as well as jet lines , trees for being able to get a clue as to size filmed jet flying by also baby blue and white in color. don't know if it was what caused the jet lines but you could hear the jets flying by. object is found in the first video filmed inside filming outside tinted window. second video is filming unknown jet flying by to give a reference to size possibly of object seen.
content.summary: Video taped jets flying over head leaving zig zag jet lines when afterwards seen a white object in the film using a digital camera video taped account

content.detailedDescription: Test - please delete
content.summary: Test for website

content.detailedDescription: The two sightings that i saw are not man made iam a aircraft nut and know my aircraft these sighting are not.The first sighting was in dec of 62 i was one my way to school and waiting for a buddy out in front of his house it was clear and cold.I just happened to look stait up and saw a group of dots about 1/16 of an inch in dia. at arms length 12 in tolal.They stayed in a none moving group for about 10 or so min. and in a split second all shot off in different dirctions of the compass.The altiude was so high that all i could was dots.The second sighting was in the spring of 2013 i was sitting on my front porch the sky was clear and i saw the object heading north from the south at a very high rate of speed cigar shaped and the exhaust was coming from the front of the craft and curling around and then trailing.I live on a aircraft flight path and see all kinds of planes all day this was huge flying 3 to 4 times faster than a comercial jet and guessing the attiltude was 50000 plus feet.If you like i would  talk to you about my sightings.   pat mcgrath   604 4650879    ps iam also a backyard astronomer
content.summary: This was the first of two sightings 1st 1962 on my way to school cold clear skys 2nd in 2013 spring clear skys

content.detailedDescription:
On a regular day i took my camera and start recording the moon surface, that day the sky was very clear oe say that was the best day for sky watch. it took around 2 hours of recording, my camera battery shows the low battery sign, then took that video transfer my laptop and start seeing that recording and suddenly i seen that ufo. i that day i seen the real ufo. the first video image is like a round ufo or say its look like a circle. but the second one i am 100% sure that ufo is look like a ufo seen in jerusalem 2011. it is my 6th sence say or you can say its a telepathy. i really do believe in this. these two video is shooted by me through my handdy cam. 
this video is captured by my handdy cam , please contact me. i am a regular sky watcher. in the first video dated 11jan14 that image is like a mother ship landed on moon surface. and the second one is also a huge ufo. i am also sending you a rough calculation of the second video image. i am also the member of indian ufo org.

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
   as i said i am a regular sky watcher, and record the sky on daily bases. 

2.What made you first notice the object?
  i checked the recording, then i noticed. because to see that object through naked eye was impossible.

3.What did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
 i was confident that it was an ufo

4.Describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
 in first video the mother ship was landed on moon surface in a very low speed, because according to me they already decided that they gonna be landed on that surface. and in second video the ufo was take off from the moon creator. it took might be 3 rounds. 

5.Describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
 i really do believe that ufo does exist. but when i saw, i feel really very happy 7 feel great, with the help of telepotation i got this video. i contact with them. 

6.How did you lose sight of the object?
 it appear and went away.
content.summary: Rrrrrrrr

content.detailedDescription:
About 10:45 pm on may 1st, i was looking out the front door side panel  windows at a bright light that seemed to be approaching from the southeast. i got my astronomical binoculars out to get a better image. (i have a celestron skymaster, 12x60, fov 5.3 degrees). intrigued, i kept watching until i realized it was likely a jet on approach to eventually going to kc airport.  a second one followed a minute or so later.  

so, i decided to just look elsewhere to the left (east) and noticed what looked like a satellite initially. it was about 35 degrees from the horizon upward. since the view was obstructed by the porch, i went into the bedroom where an upper window looked out to the sky.  it was a dark room that gave me better view of the phenomenon too.  the first light i saw seemed to move to the left for a short ways (a finger width)and then i noticed that it was very difficult to get a fix on it because it just seemed to keep jumping all over the view.  

then i realized that there were at least three lights that kept blinking in a pattern roughly counter-clockwise--giving it a shape of a triangle.  this realization really got my excitement up.  i knew that this was no longer a satellite, or anything i had ever seen before. the triangular flashing light pattern continued.

i then noticed that not only was there those three lights... but there were multiple lights that seemed to just all of a sudden be there and pulsating... perhaps a dozen or more that just kept pulsing off and on all around the triangle. i recall white, reddish, and greenish colors. now i was very interested in what was going on...My first view of what may be called an unknown flying object--for sure at least-- and wanted to try to record it with my camera's video feature on a tripod.

i took the camera out to the front porch, but by that point it was not visible.   partially the problem may have been glare from a street light at the end of the road... but i tried to record the sky in two locations that approximated where i had been looking... but i don't think anything remained to be observed.  it took about 5 minutes for me to get the camera set up, but the lights had either gone away somewhere else, or stopped pulsating....Because i could no longer find them.

i kept observing the sky for a few minutes longer with my binoculars, and saw what looked like a meteorite burn through the atmosphere not far from where the lights had been (about 60 degrees, or ene)and same angle of about 35 to 40 degrees up from the horizon... in the sky...  i have never seen a meteorite with binoculars before... it lasted longer than usual--perhaps 2 seconds--and had more of a fire trail than i had ever noticed before too.
content.summary: Lights that hovered, had triangular shapes

content.detailedDescription:
Let my dog out around 11pm. looked up above my roof as i do nightly, even more so when its clear out, corner of my eye from the east i see 5 bright white lights flying at extreme speeds no sound in a boomerang shape like geese fly, the 2 behind the lead one were swerving side to side almost like switching spots, they disappeared over lake simcoe heading west. 

i have seen some crazy things while living here looking at the sky over lake simcoe.  few years ago a bright white light that was hovering and the light was turning light police lights. changed from white to red and then took off no sound. 

i find it to be quite strange that a meteor just came down the same day yesterday in the eastern part of ontario, and that night reports of ufo's. maybe there is a link to this.
content.summary: 5 ufos flew very fast over head in boomerang shape. 2 swerving side to side

content.detailedDescription:
Multiple bright dots in the sky like stars in the afternoon bright blue sky. 
they appeared to be moving in the same direction but they also moved in and out amongst themselves rather than remaining in fixed formation. 
they were very bright and like nothing i have seen before.
then as we watched, they seemed to dim and disappear, perhaps moving away from us. 
it was difficult to gauge either size or actual distance but they were clearly round bright dots. 
they appeared to be moving slowly but then so do planes. without a sense of scale it's impossible to tell.
content.summary: Multiple starlike lights in afternoon bright sky

content.altitude: Landed, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I was going out for my nightly cig, at the side of the house on may 4 2014 at 10:30pm est
as i looked to my right or the back of the house, facing north west.
something caught my eye ??  

just north east of the moon i see a glowing pluse object in the distance moving at incredible speeds then stop on a dime!!. then it took off again at very very high speeds.

this went-on for about 10 mins , 

without warning a 2nd object appeared out of nowhere and started to fly together with the first object!!  it was like they were communicating??  flying at very high speeds.They were flying all over the north east and western sky with in seconds!!!

i can't express how fast they were going " it was crazy!!"  

at this point 3 to 5 more ufos appeared and were flying with the other objects

it was like a random crazy dance in the sky zig zagging , going fast slowing down " it was very impressive"

i have been to many air shows in the past, and i know my aircraft well.

 what i seen on may 4 2014, was something not of this world and no aircraft that we have can do what these ufo's were doing, not by a long shot.

the whole experience lasted about 40 mins

when they disappeared they were traveling in a southern direction.

my reactions to this event were disbelief and shocked that  it happened so close to home
the last ufo i seen was at "long point lake erie in 2011"  the ufos were very much the same thing.

this was a life changing experience for me because i have seen more than 1 ufo and they seem to be consistent in their nature.." makes me believe in ufo's more than ever"

there is something amazing happening to our world and i hope we the people will learn the truth some day.

mike kral
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple ufo 's dancing all over the ne sky 6 or more, they were doing crazy maneuvers at great speeds  craziest thing i have ever seen!!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving and heard a noise sort of a pop and a flash and a fizzle as i watched the object travel very quickly straight and direct across the sky it started out orange-ish and as it fizzled turned a electric blue color revealing a serated look with sharp looking edges and watched it till it entered a cloud off in a distance and because of landscape setting (a hill located directly under the cloud in the distance.  was not able to see the object come out the other side of the cloud ? it looked like a very large flare at first then crackled and turned bluish colored and wasn't leaving a smoke trail but had a white bit of a tail traveling with it i first thought it was a firework happening but i quickly realized it was not and and that it was bigger and larger and i then thought it could be a falling star? or something from the sky? i smelt a quick type of fuel smell not a firey smell but the smell was quick also and did not linger had the window down as i was driving.  i quickly thought it may be a falling star and said to make a wish
content.summary: Flash then fizzle noise and object looking like a big flare traveled bright orange then blue ragged edged colored then went into a cloud then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my house in my backyard. i was looking at the sky and observed one object that appeared to bright, large, low and seemingly too close to be a star. the object appeared to be moving subtly but more like hovering. i then noticed a second light that appeared to be much smaller, much further away and blinking. i initially thought it was a star, but it seemed to be moving much more than the other object and at times it seemed like it was jumping when it appeared to descend slightly. this smaller objects flight pattern at times seemed erratic, and honestly i wasnt sure if that was some sort of optical illusion given the blinking and distance. i dont know maybe it was a star. i really dont think it was. especially the first object i noticed which i remarked was larger and brighter than the other object. im hoping its possible to zoom in on the lights in my video to at least determine if the larger object is a star or not.  the main thing that makes me think they arent stars is that their position in relation to eachother clearly changes at different points throughout the video. my sighting ended because i decided to go inside as i got paranoid about intelligent life being aware of me recording.
content.summary: Two objects of light in the sky bery far away moving in a way that seemed strange.
